edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl

Class ExplicitCellStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.interfaces.PrimitiveStream<T>
      • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl.ExplicitStream<Cell>
        • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl.ExplicitCellStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractFilteredStream<Cell>, java.lang.Iterable<Cell>

    public class ExplicitCellStream
extends ExplicitStream<Cell>
    This class is a wrapper for the ExplicitStream class and provides convenience functions when the base elements are cells.
    Author:
    Andrew Tausz

        public int attachNewCellToPoint(int dimension,
                       int pointIndex)
        This attaches a n-cell to an existing point in the complex.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension of the cell to add
        pointIndex - the point to attach the boundary to
        Returns:
        the cell id of the newly added cell

      • attachNewCell

        public int attachNewCell(int dimension,
                int[] boundaryIndices)
        This adds a new cell to the complex with boundary specified by the supplied array of cell ids. It uses the standard attaching coefficients.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension of the cell to add
        boundaryIndices - an array of cell ids to attach to
        Returns:
        the cell id of the newly added cell

      • attachNewCell

        public int attachNewCell(int dimension,
                int[] boundaryIndices,
                int[] boundaryCoefficients)
        This adds a new cell to the complex with boundary and boundary coefficients given.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension fo the cell to add
        boundaryIndices - an array of cell ids to attach to
        boundaryCoefficients - the array of attaching map degrees
        Returns:
        the cell id of the newly added cell
